actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution authorizing testimony by the Hon. William Proxmire and representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of Fitzgerald v. Butterfield, et al.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel, pursuant to the Ethics in Government Act of 1978, to represent Senator William Proxmire in Fitzgerald v. Butterfield, et al. Authorizes Senator Proxmire to testify at deposition and at trial in such case, and to produce documents requested, excepting those which he determines privileged from disclosure.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing testimony by the Hon. William Proxmire and representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of Fitzgerald v. Butterfield, et al.
